name: Bitgate
intro: Japanese crypto currency exchange service provider
introduce: Bitgate is a Japanese crypto currency exchange service provider. Bitgate was one of the first platforms to obtain a license from the Financial Services Agency (FSA), Japan’s financial regulator. Bitgate has acquired by Daiko Holdings, a Japan-based FinTech services company. Daiko Holdings Group, headquartered in Tokyo, operates a broad range of financial services and information technology businesses.
